page.title: 17FARMING: Lepton
page.content:
There are many{farms}in the area. These farms usually have{beef or dairy {cattle.}Also, there are some very small farms and{smallholdings}where people keep just a few animals. More {horses}are seen in the area now, reflecting the popularity of{riding.}
These are some{thoughts}from a boy who lives and works on a{30 acre farm The day begins early and ends late for him, especially in the winter. In summer, he is outside a lot, especially during{haymaking.}He and about 7 others help with this work. It is hard, but they have a break during which they drink beer given to them. He likes the busy life on the farm, and the{closeness of the animals.} There is always something happening, and he wouldn't want to live in a town.
